nodes.text: Raspyon Degger was a male Rattataki who served in the Galactic Republic's navy during the Galactic War with the reconstituted Sith Empire, when he was stationed aboard the space station Carrick Station.

Raspyon Degger was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Digital Expansion Galactic Starfighter, where he is the Republic faction's Reputation Vendor for the Republic First Fleet.
